projects.title: Barclays Analytics Project
projects.description: Analyzed Barclays' financial and operational data to generate actionable insights and improve decision-making processes across departments.
projects.results: Enhanced reporting efficiency and identified key performance trends.

projects.title: Beagle Street Analytics Project
projects.description: Performed data analysis for Beagle Street, focusing on customer engagement, campaign performance, and risk assessment.
projects.results: Provided insights to optimize customer acquisition and retention strategies.

projects.title: Grenadeale Organics Dashboard Project
projects.description: Developed an interactive dashboard for Grenadeale Organics to track sales, inventory, and distribution across multiple regions.
projects.results: Enabled real-time monitoring of inventory and improved supply chain efficiency.

projects.title: JP Morgan Chase Analytics Project
projects.description: Analyzed banking and financial datasets to provide insights into transaction trends, customer behavior, and operational risks.
projects.results: Identified key trends, reducing operational risk and improving data-driven decision-making.

projects.title: LittleMedia Data Analysis Project
projects.description: Analyzed media consumption and engagement metrics for LittleMedia, using statistical and visual analytics to guide strategy.
projects.results: Increased audience engagement by optimizing content distribution strategies.

projects.title: London Bridge Analytics Project
projects.description: Performed geospatial and operational analysis for London Bridge management, monitoring visitor trends, events, and safety metrics.
projects.results: Improved crowd management and optimized resource allocation.

projects.title: ADHD Data Analysis Project
projects.description: Analyzed ADHD-related data to understand patterns in diagnosis, treatments, and behavioral trends using statistical techniques.
projects.results: Generated actionable insights for healthcare providers and educational support strategies.

projects.title: Sales & Gross Profit Dashboard (Excel)
projects.description: Created a comprehensive Excel dashboard to analyze sales and profit across products, time periods, and regions.
projects.results: Enabled management to track KPIs and identify high-performing products.

projects.title: Google Sheets Automated Data Table
projects.description: Built automated Google Sheets dashboards to track daily and weekly metrics with dynamic calculations and visualizations.
projects.results: Saved hours of manual reporting with automated updates.

projects.title: Plant/Factory Database Interactive Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a database and dashboard to track factory operations, production metrics, and workforce performance.
projects.results: Improved monitoring of production efficiency and real-time analytics.

projects.title: Billing Process Completion Dashboard
projects.description: Tracked billing completion rates for multiple clients using interactive dashboards, updated weekly with dynamic filters.
projects.results: Streamlined billing analysis and client reporting.

projects.title: Student Graduation Readiness SIS Dashboard
projects.description: Created a user-friendly dashboard in PowerSchool to consolidate student credits, courses, GPA, and at-risk indicators.
projects.results: Enabled school staff to make timely interventions and improve graduation rates.

projects.title: Regional Performance Dashboard Development
projects.description: Developed a regional dashboard displaying KPIs for multiple districts, supporting filtering and monthly updates.
projects.results: Improved regional performance assessment and reporting efficiency.

projects.title: Gaming Hours Calculator & Gaming Reduction Planner
projects.description: Redesigned Google Sheets to calculate client gaming hours and track reduction goals with visual graphs.
projects.results: Provided a clear view of gaming habits and helped clients reduce gaming time.

projects.title: Engaged Traffic & Tutorial Funnel Analysis
projects.description: Created Tableau visualizations to track user engagement, tutorial entries, exit steps, and completion rates.
projects.results: Identified critical drop-off points and optimized tutorial design.

projects.title: GNSS Data Analytics for Earthquake Patterns
projects.description: Analyzed GNSS and seismic data to identify correlations between ground displacement, earthquake magnitude, and environmental factors.
projects.results: Provided insights into earthquake behavior and predictive indicators.

projects.title: Chicago Taxi Trip Data Analysis
projects.description: Performed data analysis on taxi trips including trip duration, distance, fare structures, and digital payment usage.
projects.results: Identified route optimization opportunities and payment preferences.

projects.title: Retail Store Decision Support System
projects.description: Designed a DSS using historical sales data to support strategic decisions, customer segmentation, and sales forecasting.
projects.results: Enabled data-driven decisions and improved profitability.

projects.title: TechHaven Web-Based Retailer Relational Database
projects.description: Built a relational database to manage orders, inventory, and customer data, providing real-time analytical insights.
projects.results: Improved operational efficiency and analytical capabilities.

projects.title: Spatial Data Science – Understanding Geostatistics
projects.description: Explored spatial statistics of point events using ArcGIS and R to summarize distributions of real-world incidents.
projects.results: Enhanced skills in geospatial analysis and spatial descriptive statistics.

projects.title: SmartMart Retail Sales Analysis & Recommendations
projects.description: Analyzed grocery store transactions using Python and Excel to optimize operations and increase profitability.
projects.results: Provided actionable recommendations to improve sales and customer satisfaction.

projects.title: London Housing Data Analysis
projects.description: Used Python to analyze housing data, prices, and crime statistics, generating insights for London neighborhoods.
projects.results: Identified trends in housing prices and crime distribution.

projects.title: India Census 2011 Data Analysis
projects.description: Performed demographic analysis using Python and Pandas to extract insights from India's Census 2011 data.
projects.results: Provided structured demographic insights for policymaking and research.

projects.title: Police Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed traffic stop data to uncover gender disparities, violation distributions, and stop durations.
projects.results: Derived insights on traffic enforcement trends.

projects.title: Car Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed automotive trends, regional distributions, and outliers using Python.
projects.results: Provided insights on market trends and car attributes.

projects.title: Weather Data Analysis
projects.description: Performed analysis on weather data using Python to derive meaningful insights and statistics.
projects.results: Identified patterns in weather conditions and anomalies.

projects.title: Netflix Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed Netflix content and ratings, including duplicates, nulls, show counts, directors, and country-specific insights.
projects.results: Generated insights for content strategy and user engagement.

projects.title: SARIMA Forecasting Comparison (Python & R)
projects.description: Implemented SARIMA models in Python and R and compared forecasting results across both environments.
projects.results: Validated model accuracy and performance across software.

projects.title: Power BI Sales, Profit, Discounts & Geographical Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard for multi-dimensional business performance analysis.
projects.results: Provided management with insights into sales, profit, and geographical performance.

projects.title: MANP098 – Business Analytics ERP Case Study (Stirling Council)
projects.description: Performed ERP data analysis using Oracle Fusion Cloud to improve decision-making and service delivery.
